thread.title: Victor Blake
thread.title_full: Warrior Trading reviewed by Victor Blake

author: Victor Blake
title: Victor Blake
text: I'm starting my 3rd week of class. My Fantasy trader account started at $25K and I have lost over half of it. In the last two lessons I have learned a lot and believe I can now start to grow this paper money account. I can easily see that without taking this course my investment money would already be gone. I highly recommend this training.
